attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Spike Whip
attacks.effect: If Budew is anywhere under Roserade, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
